bibl.title: The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume LVI (Nos 3822-3875) with contributions by H.-C. Günther, P.J. Parsons, P. Schubert, and H. Baltussen, W.E.H. Cockle, R.W. Daniel, J. Finkel, S.M. Goldberg, J. Hammerstaedt, M.A. Harder, L. Käppel, A. Kerkhecker, C.G. Leidl, E. Lobel, H. Maehler, F. Maltomini, B. Meissner, F. Montanari, G. Müller, M.D. Reeve, F. Regtuit, J. Wisse

series.title: Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No.

bibl.seg: Sirivianou M.G., with contributions by H.-C. Günther, P.J. Parsons, P. Schubert, and H. Baltussen, W.E.H. Cockle, R.W. Daniel, J. Finkel, S.M. Goldberg, J. Hammerstaedt, M.A. Harder, L. Käppel, A. Kerkhecker, C.G. Leidl, E. Lobel, H. Maehler, F. Maltomini, B. Meissner, F. Montanari, G. Müller, M.D. Reeve, F. Regtuit, J. Wisse, The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume LVI (Nos 3822-3875). (Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No. 76.)
London, Egypt Exploration Society, 1989, 8°, xii-200 pp. et VIII pll., dont 2 dépl.

C.R. par Giuliana Foti Talamanca, Iura 40 (1989 [1992]) pp. 164-166. - Rosa Giannattasio Andria, Eikasmos 2 (1991) pp. 387-391 (concerne aussi P. Oxy. LVII). - Jean Lenaerts, ChrEg 67 (1992) No. 133, pp. 175-182. - Wolfgang Luppe, Gnomon 64 (1992) pp. 289-299 (concerne aussi P. Oxy LVII). - Bernhard Palme, Tyche 6 (1991) pp. 253-256. - D.W. Rathbone, CR N.S. 41 (1991) pp. 203-205 (concerne aussi P. Oxy. LV). - Hans-Albert Rupprecht, ZSav 109 (1992) pp. 592-599 (concerne aussi: P. Oxy. LIV; LV; LVII). - Hermann S. Schibli, BASP 28 (1991) pp. 91-96.
Sirivianou Günther Parsons Schubert Baltussen Cockle Daniel Finkel Goldberg Hammerstaedt Harder Käppel Kerkhecker Leidl Lobel Maehler Maltomini Meissner Montanari Müller Reeve Regtuit Wisse
